  • Method Details

    • attributes

      public AttributeSet attributes()
      Specified by:
      attributes in interface Builder<TakeOfflineConfiguration>

    • minTimeToWait

      public TakeOfflineConfigurationBuilder minTimeToWait(long minTimeToWait)
      The minimal number of milliseconds to wait before taking this site offline. It defaults to 0 (zero).

      A zero or negative value will disable any waiting time and use only afterFailures(int).

      The switch to offline status happens after a failed request (times-out or network failure) and minTimeToWait is already elapsed.

      When a request fails (after a successful request) the timer is set and it is stopped and reset after a successful request.

      Check the Infinispan Cross-Site documentation for more information about minTimeToWait(long) and afterFailures(int).

    • afterFailures

      public TakeOfflineConfigurationBuilder afterFailures(int afterFailures)
      The number of consecutive failed request operations after which this site should be taken offline. It default to 0 (zero).

      A zero or negative value will ignore the number of failures and use only minTimeToWait(long).

      Check the Infinispan Cross-Site documentation for more information about minTimeToWait(long) and afterFailures(int).

      Reads the configuration from an already created configuration bean into this builder. Returns an appropriate builder to allow fluent configuration
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      combine - the way attributes and children of this instance and the template should be combined.
